body.name: FLEXISPOT EN1 Large Stand Up Desk 55 Inches Whole-Piece Desk Computer Workstation Ergonomic Memory Controller Height Adjustable Standing Desk (White Frame + 55" White Top, 2 Packages)
features: EXTRA-SPACIOUS WHOLE-PIECE DESKTOP: Expansive 55” x 28” eco-friendly whole-piece desktop offers more than ample workspace for 2 monitors, a laptop and more so you can confidently tackle any work situation that arises. Please allow a slight 0 to1-inch difference in desktop size due to manual measurement.

ELECTRIC HEIGHT ADJUSTABLE LIFT SYSTEM: The motor lift mechanism offers smoother height adjustments, from 28" to 47.6" (without 1" thickness of table top included), at a speed of 1"/second with low noise(under 50 dB) while running.

BUILT FOR WORK FROM HOME: The perfect standing desk to allow independent and remote workers to stay active, healthy, and productive while working from home. Precisely adjust your desk to your height and insert healthy movement into your day. An industrial-grade steel frame combined with a solid desktop allows for a 154 lbs.
LED MEMORY CONTROL PANEL: A 6-button controller with 4 programmable memory presets lets you set 4 desired desk heights for convenient switching from sitting to standing throughout the day.
PLEASE NOTE: The product will be shipped in two separate packages which may be delivered separately from each other. Some steps may require a drill, which is not included.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features a Whole-Piece Desktop Unlike spliced desktops on the market, FLEXISPOT features a whole-piece desktop. We use high-quality materials and fair prices to give our customers a better experience. 1"-Thick Desktop Different from 0.6"-thick tabletops on the market, the FLEXISPOT EN1 series adopts high-quality, 1"-thick desktops that won't bend under even high-intensity use. Stable Standing Desk FLEXISPOT desks use an industrial-grade steel frame combined with a solid 1"-thick desktop, thus guaranteeing stability even in the event of an impact. A 154-lb. weight capacity supports your ideal workspace setup. Long Life Cycle FLEXISPOT standing desks complete 20,000 cycles of raising and lowering to verify their life cycle. Every model offers extensive durability and long life to ensure our electric standing desks operate efficiently, quietly, and above all, safely.

Is the top a single piece or two (split) pieces? Our standing desk features a whole-piece desktop that provides a completely smooth surface, is easy to clean, and eliminates bumps and noise caused by gaps while increasing the stability of the whole table. How can I track the status of my order? We ship the desktop and legs in separate boxes so they can be delivered more easily and arrive intact. You can contact FLEXISPOT for specific tracking numbers for your order. Does this product come with assembly tools? We include all the hardware you need right in the box. Certain installation steps may be easier to complete with an electric screwdriver, which is not included. How durable are FlexiSpot standing desks? Our desks are built to last, and we have the durability tests to prove it. During product testing, we raise and lower our desks more than 20,000 times—with zero sign of breakdown. If you any problems, please contact FLEXISPOT. What is the height range? The height of the desk can be adjusted from 28" to 47.6" (1" thickness of table top not included) at a speed of 1"/second with low noise (under 50 dB) while running.

FLEXISPOT whole-piece desktop standing desk If you like incorporating technology into your workspace, you should get your hands on this desk. I also like the whole-piece desktop; other sellers' desks have spliced tops. -From Jo Click FLEXISPOT is a desk worth having! Among the many elevating desks they have, I found my favorite color combination at FLEXISPOT. Other sellers can't offer this because they only have fixed color combinations, but I like DIY! -From Lori Click A great solution for working from home I recommend this amazing standing desk from FLEXISPOT. I can set the exact heights I want without having to strain every time I want to switch between sitting and standing. -From Jean Click Ergonomic lifestyle An ergonomic work environment is something I've always wanted. FLEXISPOT puts such a lifestyle within reach. It's the perfect desk for anyone looking for style and convenience. I love it. -From Ross Click This is an exciting standing desk! It transforms how I handle my work from the comfort of my home. The adjustable-height desk allows me to switch from sitting to standing in seconds with the simple press of a button. -From kaherrm Click

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well constructed and looks great..
reviews.reviewText: Shipping and packing: It comes in 2 packages. Amazon provided the tracking number of the table top. Mine arrived together, but for my colleague it arrived separately - it depends on how fedex ships these parcels. It was shipped promptly from CA, but took 9 days to arrive at MA. Desktop is 33 lb, while the frame is 50lb. It was very well packaged and despite the scuffs and dings on the package everything inside was good.Assembling: It is quite heavy. While I was able to do this myself, it would be good to have help. Packages are also quite heavy. Instruction booklet was clear, but take your time to read and review carefully. It took about 2 hrs total to assemble. I suspect for the second table it would be just 20 min. Fasteners look good quality and allen wrench and spanners are provided. To attach the control box you will need to drill 2 holes, and and wish the holes for this was predrilled. You could probably use double sided tape to attach to the bottom of the table, since it is very light. The others holes for screws to attach with the frame and buttons are all predrilled. After assembly, I used sliders to move it easily over carpet.Looks: I ordered the white frame with maple top. Frame looks very sturdy. Frame is slightly off white and looks very elegant with table top. Table top seems to be of good quality with rounded edges and quite sturdy. Both top and bottom have a good quality veneer. The frame has leveling screws at all 4 corners.Performance: Table top moves up and down quite smoothly with very little sound. Memory button is quite useful to set positions. Lowest height shows 28", but is actually 29" to the top of table. This seems just fine for me. Upper height is at 49". That's too high for me and I've set it at 40". It holds two 24" monitors and a laptop and goes up and down with no problems.I've been using for a few days now, and its very good to be able to stand and work for part of the day. I'm more active and move around during that time. Over time I hope to be able to stand for longer hours. I really should have bought this years ago.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, Affordable, Easy to Assemble
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to assemble this desk. Conveniently, I got the tools I needed with the package and the instructions were pretty good.The quality is great for the price and it feels sturdy. The motors are quiet and it raises and lowers smoothly and well. They provide a nice trap for wire management, as well as convenient hooks on either side for hanging headphones or whatever else.The USB port on the console is convenient to boot.Overall, it's really good for the price and there is a decent selection of colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this desk so far. It is very spacious and the touchpad is easy to use. It is very heavy and sturdy so I'm pretty confident it will never tip over, and it can definitely hold all of my stuff. The white looks so smooth and clean and feels very modern. I was able to fit my Flexispot filing cabinet under the desk and there is still plenty of room for my legs when I am sitting at the desk. It raises quite high. I am kind of short so it goes way higher than I will ever need it. I saw a lot of people saying it was confusing to build. There really aren't that many parts, so just look closely at the instructions and you will be fine. The only thing is that these desks are mix n match with the tabletops so sometimes there will be multiple drill holes on the underside of the desk top depending on which desk frame you got, you will have to figure out which holes you are supposed to use. But I had no trouble putting it together, it is very heavy though so you may need an extra hand to lift it/flip it over. That just shows it's made with high quality materials and is made well! Very happy with this desk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Stylish Budget Option!
reviews.reviewText: Overall, I am happy with my desk! I have the 55 x 28 maple top with white legs. It's a great size if you have multiple monitors or just like a little more elbow room on your desk. I work from home and I'm still in school, so it's a great price point for me and has made my procrastination and back/knee pain decrease substantially lol (your hamstrings will thank you). While it is a bit too high for me at the lowest setting - about 29 inches - I don't mind it too much since I have a dog and he loves to lay under it while I work.The table top is nice and sturdy. Not too thin and not too thick. Perfect for most clamp-on monitor arms and other clamp-on accessories. While my dream desk is an oak Ergonofis, this is the best thing I could find that met my needs and had a similar aesthetic. Hope this was helpful! Will add updates in a few months once I'm settled into my next place and see if I'm still happy with it then.PROS:- ROUNDED CORNERS Y'ALL!- more than enough size for laptop + monitor + nintendo switch dock + keyboard + mouse + plants/decor- great quality for the price- nice and heavy so it feels like a quality product- easy assembly (just read the instructions people)- quick ship time- plenty of size and wood options- can always switch out legs or table top if desiredCONS:- table is still too tall for me (5'2)- it weights over 100 lbs all together so don't try to lift the whole thing by yourself if it's bigger than 40 inches. You WILL need one other person to help with set up and moving it around.- wish the stand reminders were standard on all desks with preset options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it. So far so good
reviews.reviewText: Hard to assemble, however its worth the struggle. Sturdy and looks great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this to use as a work table in my sewing room. I love that it is height-adjustable, so I can raise it up to avoid back strain when cutting fabric. The instructions were excellent and the parts were all divided into little separate sections and labeled so there was no guessing which bolt to use.This table is excellent quality - heavy duty and well made. The motorized function raises the table smoothly and there are 4 memory settings for my favorite heights. I'm 100% happy with this purchase.
The quality of the table is very good. And cheaper than other tables that are available in the market with the same facilities.

This was a wonderful purchase, very happy. The top did come damaged (in transit) but the company were so prompt to reply and send another without fault and very quickly arrived, nil issues. The company also checked that I was happy and was available if I needed anything. The desk is ergonomic for long hours and looks sleek; great value for the money spent. Only thing to note is black colour top can leave finger print marks (not a negative for me though), easily removed with a quick wipe.

So far really happy with the desk, feels solid and sturdy and it barely wobbles at all even with a 32 inch monitor and a 27 together. Smooth, quiet operation and relatively easy to setup. It was also delivered a few days earlier than expected which was a plus! Overall, incredible value and really happy with this purchase.

Putting things together takes a bit of time, not to mention needing to flip the table once constructed. Motor and rod can be a bit hidden rather than exposed. Similarly cables (controller to motor, power socket cable to motor) are just badly exposed, could do with a bit of covering. Structurally very solid, no wobbly going up or down, able to hold heavy objects. Safety stop detection works well, it will stop at impact. Controller memorise settings well, very handy to use any presets. Very satisfied
Actually works and its nice it sometimes glitches but not a major problem you can trouble shoot it but thats my biggest concern rgeat product overall
